title: Ruthless Redemption
description:
They say love hurts—but they never mentioned it could make you bleed.
His deceit was like wine.I drank it in. Let it intoxicate me.But he’s not the man I fell for.Matthew Langston is a lie.I’d run from him if I could. I’d flee. If only he hadn’t turned my family against me.Now, I have nothing. There’s no money, phone, or external support.Only him, and his obsession with winning me back.So I’ll use it to my advantage. I’ll use him.Because he made a promise to help me get revenge on those we despise.And once that’s over, so are we.
The seductively thrilling conclusion to Matthew and Layla's story.
author: Eden Summers
